title: Checked up on them: add summer-of-code email to recipients
body_html: Right now, when a supervisor comments on their team's progress, an email update is sent to all supervisors – but not to orgas. We should change that so the email is also sent to the summer-of-code email address (either as direct recipient or cc).
body_text: Right now, when a supervisor comments on their team's progress, an email update is sent to all supervisors – but not to orgas. We should change that so the email is also sent to the summer-of-code email address (either as direct recipient or cc).
body: Right now, when a supervisor comments on their team's progress, an email update is sent to all supervisors – but not to orgas. We should change that so the email is also sent to the summer-of-code email address (either as direct recipient or cc).
